attributes.action: improve street lighting in all areas of the UK making the streets a much safer place at night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK´s streets are dark after nightfall, very dark. It doesn´t make going outside very appealing at all. Life does not finish at 17.00 hours, but it does for so many UK citizens because of poor street lighting. Improper lighting aids car thieves, burglars, muggers to get what they want. Let´s stop this by making the streets safer at night. It is a well known fact that more people would leave their homes in the evening if they felt safer walking in the streets, better street lighting would enable more people to go out at night, in turn increasing the economy. City centres are even too dark at the moment, sort it out please with energy saving lightbulbs we can make a difference.
